item.description:
This year the Boston Demons famous Grand Final Party to be held at Tommy Doyles in Harvard Sq, Sat 27th of September at 1.30pm

This is NOT the same location as last year, Tommy's in Harvard is seconds from Harvard T and is a great location for watching footy with several t.v's around the bar as well as the high def big screen.

Entry is $20 which includes entry to the lucky door prize drawings to be drawn at each quarter, also a free meat pie and beer for the first 75 people through the door is motivation to get in early to get a good spot!

Up for grabs in this years raffle is an aussie food and wine hamper worth over 200 smackeroonies, an extremely large meat tray, slabs of red bull, Coopers beer and lots of other fun stuff.

Hot delicious meat pies will be on sale and lots of Aussie beer will be readily available to wet that thirsty Aussie whistle.

Get down in your teams colours and get excited for what is one of Boston's biggest Aussie parties of the year!

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: AFL GRAND FINAL PARTY
